name: Baguette Birb
description:
You play as a small pigeon called Birb. Upon pressing the start button, Birb must eat as many baguettes as possible in 30 seconds. High-scores will be shown in the main menu. Baguettes will have different colours that signify the effect that it gives,  some are positive and others are negative.

I made this game in Java (JavaFX) using IntelliJ. This is one of my first games and the first one I have used images for, instead of shapes like squares and circles and text based games.

Art: 

- Pigeon: https://noktis.itch.io/pigeon

- Baguette: http://pixelartmaker.com/art/f8878bf89eade89

- Background: Made by me in MS Paint (Win 7 edition)

Source Code: https://github.com/divadnebnahtan/BaguetteBirb

Wiki: https://github.com/divadnebnahtan/BaguetteBirb/wiki

Also feel free to join our Discord server https://discord.gg/gky6pvawrT!
